A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So this is odd\, the critics love it\, but many of the the “fans” hate it\, with all the vitriol that only a social media trolling campaign can generate. Personally\, as a rabid devourer of all things sci-fi for the last 40 years\, I thoroughly enjoyed it. Brilliant classic SW\, reborn and reimagined. Don’t believe the nonsense about it being worse than the soul-sapping phantom menace - the two are not in any way comparable. Compelling\, engaging\, surprising and a whole lot of fun.
